phrs.translation: 另有所图；有不同意见；别有用心

sentences.sentence: Jones has been axed from the team.
Other less profitable services are to be axed later this year.
sentences.translation: 其他盈利较少的服务项目预定今年稍晚将大量削减。

sentences.sentence: Community projects are being axed by hard-pressed social services departments.
sentences.translation: 社区项目正遭到受困社会服务部门的削减。
